data.title: Armin van Buuren’s All-Time A State Of Trance Top 1000 List!
data.meta_description: Listen and subscribe to the official A State Of Trance Top 1000 playlist on Spotify Here are the results of the all-time A State Of Trance Top 1000. The Top 1000 list took center stage during a seven-day-long...
data.text:
Listen and subscribe to the official A State Of Trance Top 1000 playlist on Spotify

Here are the results of the all-time A State Of Trance Top 1000. The Top 1000 list took center stage during a seven-day-long A State Of Trance Top 1000 stream, running down to the milestone episode of Armin van Buuren’s weekly radio show when the broadcast of episode 999 ended on January 14 at 10 p.m. (CET).

Presented by Armin van Buuren, co-host Ruben de Ronde and monthly show resident Ferry Corsten, the A State of Trance Top 1000 stream featured everything from ASOT year mixes, exclusive interviews and fan videos to the official countdown of the A State Of Trance Top 1000. The list is composed of the most popular ASOT-played records of all time, based on the votes of the show’s fan base.

When the seven-day livestream ended on Thursday, January 21, our hosts then dived head first into the 1000th episode of A State Of Trance, live from the ASOT radio studio in Amsterdam. The broadcast started three hours earlier than normal – at 5 p.m. instead of 8 p.m. (CET) – and ran through the final top 50 tracks of the A State Of Trance Top 1000, finishing with the top ASOT play of all time as voted for by the fans. Stay tuned to the ASOT socials for news concerning the upcoming ASOT 1000 celebrations later in the year!

A State Of Trance Top 1000

1 Armin van Buuren feat. Susana – Shivers

2 Tiësto – Adagio For Strings

3 GAIA – Tuvan

4 Delerium feat. Sarah McLachlan – Silence (Tiësto’s In Search Of Sunrise Remix)

5 Armin van Buuren – Communication (Part 3)

6 Gouryella – Anahera

7 RAM – RAMsterdam (Jorn van Deynhoven Remix)

8 Dash Berlin with Cerf & Mitiska & Jaren – Man On The Run

9 Gareth Emery feat. Christina Novelli – Concrete Angel

10 RAM & Susana – RAMelia (Tribute To Amelia)

11 Above & Beyond feat. Richard Bedford – Sun & Moon (Above & Beyond Club Mix)

12 Gareth Emery & STANDERWICK feat. HALIENE – Saving Light

13 4 Strings – Take Me Away (Into The Night)

14 Armin van Buuren feat. Justine Suissa – Burned With Desire (Rising Star Vocal Mix)

15 Rank 1 – Airwave

16 Paul van Dyk – For An Angel (PvD E-Werk Club Mix )

17 Above & Beyond pres. OceanLab – Satellite

18 Motorcycle – As The Rush Comes (Gabriel & Dresden Sweeping Strings Mix

19 Aly & Fila feat. Jwaydan – We Control The Sunlight

20 Armin van Buuren feat. Sharon Den Adel – In And Out Of Love

21 Veracocha – Carte Blanche

22 Above & Beyond & Gareth Emery pres. OceanLab – On A Good Day (Metropolis)

23 MaRLo & Feenixpawl – Lighter Than Air

24 Dash Berlin – Till The Sky Falls Down

25 Chicane feat. Maire Brennan Of Clannad – Saltwater

26 Above & Beyond with Andy Moor – Air For Life

27 Paul van Dyk feat. Hemstock & Jennings – Nothing But You (PvD Club Mix)

28 Dash Berlin feat. Emma Hewitt – Waiting

29 Roger Shah presents Sunlounger feat. Zara – Lost (Club Mix)

30 GAIA – Empire Of Hearts

31 Andain – Beautiful Things (Gabriel & Dresden Unplugged Mix)

32 Armin van Buuren feat. Trevor Guthrie – This Is What It Feels Like (W&W Remix)

33 Robert Miles – Children (Dream Version)

34 Alex M.O.R.P.H. feat. Sylvia Tosun – An Angel’s Love

35 Gareth Emery feat. Bo Bruce – U (Bryan Kearney Remix)

36 Armin van Buuren feat. Miri Ben-Ari – Intense

37 Key4050 & Plumb – I Love You

38 Richard Durand & Christina Novelli – The Air I Breathe (Club Mix)

39 John O’Callaghan feat. Audrey Gallagher – Big Sky (Agnelli & Nelson Remix)

40 Armin van Buuren feat. Jan Vayne – Serenity

41 Push – Universal Nation

42 Giuseppe Ottaviani – Through Your Eyes

43 Luminary – Amsterdam (Smith & Pledger Remix)

44 Energy 52 – Café Del Mar ’98 (Original Three ‘N One Mix)

45 Aly & Fila – It’s All About The Melody

46 System F – Out Of The Blue

47 Gareth Emery feat. Lucy Saunders – Sanctuary

48 Above & Beyond feat. Zoë Johnston – Good For Me (Above & Beyond Club Mix)

49 ATB – Ecstasy (Clubb Mix)

50 Tiësto – Suburban Train
